document_data.name: Taxidermy Society of the Sword Coast
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Taxidermy Society of the Sword Coast''' was an organization that supervised professional taxidermists across the [[Sword Coast]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''How about you just leave and I won't report you to the Taxidermy Society of the Sword Coast, hmm? They can be quite a self-preserving bunch!''|Nagnorm Stuffler}}
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, eccentric taxidermist [[Nagnorm Stuffler]] of [[Gillian's Hill]] was a member of the Taxidermy Society of the Sword Coast. When confronted by the [[Hero of Daggerford]] in an attempt to rescue a talking [[druid]] [[penguin]] from being vivisected and stuffed, Nagnorm threatened the Hero with filing a complaint with the organization. But his attitude changed with the help of 100 [[gold piece]]s.
